title: Between
resume: Between is the story of a town under siege from a mysterious disease that has wiped out everybody except those 21 years old and under. The series explores the power vacuum that results when a government has quarantined a 10-mile diameter area and left the inhabitants to fend for themselves.

The series explores the power vacuum that results when a government has quarantined a 10-mile diameter area and left the inhabitants to fend for themselves. View All Seasons Social Reviews  1 Discussions  1 A review by Girl lost in seriation  2.0 Written by  Girl lost in seriation  on June  3, 2018 S01: Honestly I was glad that I only had 6 episodes and they did not force me anymore. To the actors: it is worth to represent more things than a single facial expression and classic adolescent stereotypes, although the latter is actually the fault of the lousy writers. Try to be obscure and conspirative and end up being the worst of clichés. Save yourself the trouble. S02: While Netflix saw potential, the low audience shows the low arrival to the public that has the series. Lack of tension, the series fails to captivate as it should. I support what was said about the first season. I do not...  read the rest.
